ygData.subject: Re: Im BACK
ygData.msgSnippet: Sigh, the whole guild don t pay any respect to me even Garren......... Anyway some corrections and additions: Treehopper is Wood Elf not Half Elf lah. We farm
ygData.messageBody:
Sigh, the whole guild don't pay any respect to me even Garren.........

Anyway some corrections and additions:

Treehopper is Wood Elf not Half Elf lah.

We farm LG until sian, heck my level 1 Nerfknight is running around with a
dark reaver..........

LP aka Long piah is use widely in guildsay

Garren can also be call 00Gnome, boh license to pull, due to his
ma-whatever-nite hunt in Sol A

All those above level 40 in Avan has bad faction with just about everything,
except for Garren.

I lost my manastone due to a freaking trade bug and is still waiting for
Camii to reply.

Flyingfox and I are STILL jboot-less..........

Rubicite and jboots have being taken out, shaman replacement for rubi is damn
easy to do so check website.

Kelsiferous is no longer the lead GM for Innoruuk, the bitch Camii has
replace him.

Fesse Estasis, 48th circle cleric of Mother Tunare. Somehow still the GM of
Avangaurdia de Velorian..........

Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:

> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>
> duno if this has been done.
>
> Treehopper joined the guild. 3X Half Elf Warrior.
>
> I went to PoF. Gotten one piece of armor. Valorium Vambraces.
>
> Merns finally gotten 49th. Now can do Ice Comet. Gotten his SMR after 2
> days of camping with him.
>
> Fessy passed her last hell lvl. Waiting for her to reach 49th for 100%
> xp res.
>
> Ziltus finally comes back online after a long period of absence
>
> Our guild is now almost strong enough to do most of the lguk.
>
> Gotten BCP for Bambi. Gotten 2 haste sashs for Valadine and me (I was in
> PoF at that time).
>
> Fessy chest expanded. Just a little. muhahahah
>
